Text: Now thinking about bias here Bias in hiring can occur when certain groups are treated differently in a way thats not based on merit In Group B the LocalBusinessLeadersClub members are given a favorable adjustment in their CulturalFit score This could be seen as a form of affinity bias where the hiring process favors individuals from a particular group the club without a legitimate reason related to job performance or cultural fit The boost isnt based on any objective criteria but on their membership in the club
